*** Settings ***
Library           Process

*** Keywords ***
Start And Import Remote
    [Arguments]    ${name}
    Start Process    python    ${CURDIR}${/}${name}.py    alias=${name}    stderr=STDOUT
    Import Library    Remote    http://localhost:8270
    Set Log Level    DEBUG

Stop Remote
    [Arguments]    ${name}
    ${result} =    Terminate Process    handle=${name}
    Log    ${result.stdout}
